TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DesignerOptionService extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerOptionService
Public MustInherit Class DesignerOptionService Implements IDesignerOptionService

summary.span: 提供用于获取和设置设计器选项值的基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for getting and setting option values for a designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供选项的集合。The class provides a collection of options. 这些选项集合中的每一个都有一个索引器，该索引器可用于进一步筛选。Each of these option collections has an indexer that enables it to be further filtered. 每个选项集合都包含自己的一组选项，以及其所有子选项的汇总。Each option collection contains its own set of options, as well as a rollup of all of its child options. 如果属性之间发生命名冲突，最外面的选项对象将优先。In the event of a naming conflict between properties, the outermost options object takes precedence. 以下 **工具 | 选项** "用户界面 (UI) 结构显示最外面的 Options 对象如何提高重要性：The following **Tools | Options** user interface (UI) structure shows how the outermost options object takes on greater importance: **WindowsFormsDesigner | 常规****WindowsFormsDesigner | General** - **SnapToGrid****SnapToGrid** - **ShowGrid****ShowGrid** - **GridSize****GridSize** 给定一个 命名的 `service` ，若要获取属性的值 ，请执行以下调用：Given a named `service`, to get to the value of the property, you would make the following call: [!code-cpp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CPP/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CS/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/VB/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.vb#2)] 这适用于你想要移动 到另一页。This works, until you want to move to another page. 此外， 不提供发现机制。Also, provides no discovery mechanism. 如果不知道要传入的字符串，服务将找不到属性值。If you do not know what string to pass in, the service cannot find the property value. 类解决了这些问题。The class addresses these issues. 您可以查询集合，而在对象上定义的类型转换器会将 集合标记为可展开。You can query collections, and there is a type converter defined on the object that marks the collection as expandable. 使用此类型转换器，你可以将整个设计器选项服务传递到属性窗口，并以可视方式检查服务。With this type converter, you can pass the entire designer option service to a property window and visually inspect the service. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 以显示标准选项的当前值。The following code example demonstrates accessing the to display the current values of the standard options. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService/CS/designeroptionservicecontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService/VB/designeroptionservicecontrol.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `value`参数指定一个对象，该对象的公共属性用于 选项集合的集合。The `value` parameter specifies an object whose public properties are used in the collection of the option collection. `value` `null` 如果此选项集合不提供任何属性，则该参数可以为。The `value` parameter can be `null` if this options collection does not offer any properties. 属性以这种方式进行包装，以便将任何内容传递到的组件参数 ，并被 `value` 替换。Properties are wrapped in such a way that passing anything into the component parameter of the is ignored, and the `value` object is substituted.

span.span: or is .
is an empty string.

summary.span: 获取此服务的选项集合。

span.span: Gets the options collection for this service.

value.span: 用可用的设计器选项进行填充的 。

span.span: A populated with available designer options.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 始终存在包含子集合的全局选项集合。There is always a global options collection that contains child collections. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过命名索引器来导航集合，以便可以获取选项的值 `GridSize` 。The following code example shows how you can navigate the collections by named indexers so you can get the value of the `GridSize` option. 所有三个变体返回相同的值。All three variations return the same value. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService/CS/designeroptionservicecontrol.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService/VB/designeroptionservicecontrol.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 用户第一次请求选项集合的子选项或属性时，将按需调用方法。The method is called on demand the first time a user asks for child options or properties of an options collection. 可以 `options` 通过调用 方法并将此集合作为父级传递来填充集合。You can populate the `options` collection by calling the method and passing this collection as the parent.
